title: Game is filled with crybabies that riot caters to
body:
Ever have someone trash talk you for making a play they didn't like? Didn't help your rammus jungle invade level 1? Didn't try to 2v4 with your jungler to defend the early invade? 

Its funny how people who have very little understanding of the game can trash talk you, but when you get irritated and respond with something less than friendly thats grounds for a mute. This problem is compounded when the team has no idea what they're talking about either, and turn on you as well. So you have 4 people trash talking you, and of course being irritated you respond to all of them. But guess what! you're in the wrong here, majority wins

In a nutshell, it doesn't matter who's right, who's wrong, or even who says what! It just matters who the team dislikes, cause they are the majority, and riot agrees with the majority.

(keep in mind the majority of league players are stuck in silver){{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
> In a nutshell, it doesn't matter who's right, who's wrong, or even who says what! It just matters who the team dislikes, cause they are the majority, and riot agrees with the majority.

Actually, it does matter who says what, and it's not a majority thing (at least, not a majority of players in that game/team thing). It takes one report to get the Instant Feedback System to check out someone's logs, which means it doesn't matter if you're being reported by a 4 man premade or if that odd man out is reporting your premade. No punishment happens unless the IFS verifies the report based on what was said.

There is a standard of common decency that's expected though. Too many people who post on these boards don't seem to know what trash talking is, but want to use it as an excuse to get out of their punishment anyway.

it does matter, i reported the people who trash talked me basically saying the same things i said but maybe with half the frequency. (idk cause i muted all after they started talking trash) none of them got punished, only me. 4v1

idc if you're stuck in silver bronze or whatever, just don't trash talk people for their gameplay if you are low elo and KNOW you don't know much about the game. That's all

Don't post stuff here expecting other players to comply with you OP. All you'll get are people defending their beloved company.
I'll give you the real reason people get banned.
Bans are more frequently awarded of recent. Ritos loot thingy made the company take a hit in sales because people bought less skins.
Now you get keys for honour. And well if you ban players they dont get keys and spend to buy them.
Keys cost less than entire skins so people buy them more readily and the people who wouldn't spend for skins spend for keys as well since they're cheap.
So its all a business strategy really. You don't get voice chat for the same reason as well.
Quit thinking Rito cares about the community. They care about neither the toxic nor sober parties.
And don't be upset. It's the same with every other game or anything really.
Just chill and play.
